detail.example: You do not have permission to perform this action.

scopes.read+write: Use `read+write` to create, send, delete, and download documents, and `read` to view templates and document details.

oauth2.description:
Send the authenticating user to the prolibu OAuth2 request URL. We recommend a button or a link titled
"Connect to prolibu" if you are connecting users from a custom application. Users will see the "Authorize Application" screen.
When the user clicks "Authorize", prolibu redirects the user back to your site with an authorization code inside the URL.

https://dev10.prolibu.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id={client_id}&redirect_uri={redirect_uri}&scope=read+write&response_type=code

`client_id` and `redirect_uri` values should match your application settings.
